about_the_game:
Welcome to:

Healer Simulator RPG


Here you can meet some of the characters who will tell you some of their stories.
You will also learn the beginning of your own destiny and which way you will go on the road of adventure.

Heal the sick (or don't heal - the choice is yours), learn stories, explore and solve the rubble.

Approximate playing time of the Demo version:
1 hour

Good luck and enjoy ;)

content_descriptors.notes:
The game has elements showing the naked parts of the forehead, WITHOUT showing the genitals, as well as dialogues mentioning sexual intercourse, but WITHOUT demonstrating sexual intercourse.

The game contains elements of harm, violence and death of game characters, shown in Anime style, WITHOUT details.
